body:
Why do we have additional helper here, and not use checkAllSameGPU https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/TensorUtils.cpp#L131 ?
Also, agree with Adam, checks should be only in cudnn RNN, everything else in that native paths is checked already.
